Class ec.ui.ScrollingButtonListView 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.View
           |
           +----netscape.application.ScrollGroup
                   |
                   +----ec.ui.ScrollingButtonListView
class ScrollingButtonListView
extends ScrollGroup
View class for displaying a list of buttons. The name string is all we care about for each button. It also becomes the command that gets sent to target.

There are two ways to add items to the view. You can supply a hashtable where the keys are strings to be used as button labels, when creating the view. After that, addButton(String) will add a button and will immediately redraw the button view, if necessary sorting alphabetically.

This class is not public and can therefore cannot be used outside this package.
